citations.narrative:
***During the week of July 22, 2024, an inspector in California observed Sea Lion Splash exhibiting sea lions. The current
license for this facility had expired. Lack of licensure for regulated activity lessens the ability of inspectors to ensure the
welfare of the animals. The owner must ensure that a valid license is obtained and maintained as required.
This was corrected with a new application and must remain corrected from this date, July 30, 2024 forward.

citations.narrative:
***The home inspector was notified by an inspector that was at the California Fair during the week of July 22, 2024. Sea
Lion Splash was at the fair exhibiting sea lions. There was no itinerary submitted for this event. Lack of itinerary
submissions lessens the ability for inspectors to ensure the welfare of animals while in travel status. The facility must
submit itineraries with required information for each event that includes overnight travel.
To be corrected from July 30, 2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
